tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE TaskAggregations (
    task_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    task_name VARCHAR(255),
    dataset_id INT,
    data_size DECIMAL,
    aggregation_result DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE Aggregates (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    task_name VARCHAR(50),
    dataset_name VARCHAR(50),
    result DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE Tasks (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    task_name VARCHAR(50),
    task_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE Datasets (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    dataset_name VARCHAR(50),
    dataset_size BIGINT
)

CREATE TABLE TaskResults (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    task_id INT,
    result DECIMAL,
    FOREIGN KEY (task_id) REFERENCES Tasks(id)
)

CREATE TABLE task_metrics (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    task_name TEXT,
    task_status TEXT,
    execution_time INT,
    result_count INT
);

CREATE TABLE data_aggregates (
    aggregate_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    aggregate_name TEXT,
    aggregate_function TEXT,
    dataset_id INT,
    result_value DOUBLE PRECISION
);
